hash_line_comments.name: comment.line.number-sign.hcl
hash_line_comments.comment: Line comments start with # sequence and end with the next newline sequence. A line comment is considered equivalent to a newline sequence

double_slash_line_comments.name: comment.line.double-slash.hcl
double_slash_line_comments.comment: Line comments start with // sequence and end with the next newline sequence. A line comment is considered equivalent to a newline sequence

block_inline_comments.name: comment.block.hcl
block_inline_comments.comment: Inline comments start with the /* sequence and end with the */ sequence, and may have any characters within except the ending sequence. An inline comment is considered equivalent to a whitespace sequence
